forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow likely. Cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 21. Northwest wind around 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Boston today, a soft veil of snow blankets the city, whispering reminders of winter’s grip. The overcast sky casts a muted light, with clouds stretching thick and low overhead, creating an atmosphere thick with anticipation. A north wind tousles the air at a gentle pace, hinting at the chill as temperatures hover around thirty-three degrees. With the likelihood of light snow, one might expect the ground to cradle an enchanting layer of white, glimmering under the dim daylight—an invitation for those seeking a peaceful stroll or a moment of reflection in parks that wear winter's coat.

As evening approaches, the chance of snow will taper off to a mere whisper, giving way to clearer skies, though a brisk northwest wind serves as a reminder of the lingering cold. Lurking temperatures will drop to a frosty twenty-one, prompting thoughts of bundling up in cozy layers. A warm scarf and a reliable pair of gloves will serve you well against the biting air. While outdoor plans might feel less enticing, perhaps a moment spent enjoying a warm beverage in the cozy embrace of a local café or diving into a good book by a window could enrich your afternoon. In these winter moments, simplicity and warmth can paint the day in hues of contentment, making it a perfect time to find delight in quiet pleasures.
